snippet.title: Paranormal Night Shift - Preview Trailer
snippet.description:
Paranormal Night Shift is an observation and spot the anomaly game, in a setting of a haunted house in the 80s.

As ghost hunters, you and your friend Gary were called to rescue a family in the north of London. 

What mysteries lies inside the house ? 
Will you be able to survive the 3 nights ?

The game will be available soon on Steam and Epic Game Store.

Audio in English and French
Interface and subtitles in English, French, Spanish, Italian, German, Russian and Simplified Chinese.

Enjoy !
Wheeler Whale Games
